name: Penguin Fight Glow Ice Hockey Shootout Extreme
name_original: Penguin Fight Glow Ice Hockey Shootout Extreme
description:
penguin glow ice hockey sprot game is easy and fun to play!

this game works like a classic air hockey table game but it will bring you even more fun.

how to play:
- select mode 1 player or 2 player
- select level in each mode
- control your player with your finger
- try to get the hockey puck shooting into your opponent's goal
- the game ends when either player has scored 5 goals

addictive all the penguin glow ice hockey sports game for every generation also kids and adults. download now!
